 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָהַב‎</span>] **verb** ==act stormily, boisterously, arrogantly== ([[Eccl.13.8|Eccl 13:8]] Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il ***make proud*** (rare), [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְהֵב‎</span> ***be arrogant***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ra°âbu***</u></abbr>, ***storm*** at (angrily); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be alarmed, frightened***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Pe\`al Participle ***trembling, hastening***, Aph\`el ***terrify, hasten***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְחֲבוּ הַנַּעַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּזָּקֵן‎</span> [[Isa.3.5|Isa 3:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִגַּשׂ‎</span>) ***storm against*** ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">προσκόψει</span>); ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְהַב רֵעֶ(י)ךָ‎</span> [[Prov.6.3|Prov 6:3]] ***beset, importune, thy friend*** ([[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 61</sup> conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְהַן‎</span> ***give surety***, compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הרהין‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְהִיבֻ֑נִי‎</span> [[Song.6.5|Song 6:5]], of eyes, dubious: ***alarm me*** [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]], ***awe me*** [[BDB#Gi|Gi]], ***disturb, confuse me, ***Oettli [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Intr. 419</sup> (446) [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]; ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְהִבֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.138.3|Ps 138:3]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] ***thou makest me proud, bold*** ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] denominative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹהַב‎</span>).
